<pre class="prettyprint lang-wiki"><table id="src_table_0"><tr
id=sl_svn257_1

 onmouseover="gutterOver(1)"

><td class="source">#summary Simple RBAC using a Authorization Matrix<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_2

 onmouseover="gutterOver(2)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_3

 onmouseover="gutterOver(3)"

><td class="source">= Introduction =<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_4

 onmouseover="gutterOver(4)"

><td class="source">RBAC or role-based access control, deals with the accessibility of application functionality that depends on the role of the user. Depending on the role of a user, functionality in your application may:<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_5

 onmouseover="gutterOver(5)"

><td class="source"> * be enabled or disabled<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_6

 onmouseover="gutterOver(6)"

><td class="source"> * be visible or hidden<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_7

 onmouseover="gutterOver(7)"

><td class="source"> * show a different UI layout<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_8

 onmouseover="gutterOver(8)"

><td class="source"> * provide more of less details<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_9

 onmouseover="gutterOver(9)"

><td class="source">To setup RBAC, you need to know what roles are applicable. For each combination of role and information access, you must be able to specify whether it is allowed or not. One way to represent this is to setup an authorisation matrix.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_10

 onmouseover="gutterOver(10)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_11

 onmouseover="gutterOver(11)"

><td class="source">== Example ==<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_12

 onmouseover="gutterOver(12)"

><td class="source">The snippets below show an example of using the Authorizer Class.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_13

 onmouseover="gutterOver(13)"

><td class="source">Before setting up the authorisation rules, you need to design the matrix.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_14

 onmouseover="gutterOver(14)"

><td class="source">=== Design the Authorisation Matrix ===<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_15

 onmouseover="gutterOver(15)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_16

 onmouseover="gutterOver(16)"

><td class="source">|| Action - Role      || supervisor || administrator || dean || planner ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_17

 onmouseover="gutterOver(17)"

><td class="source">|| manage students    || x          || x             || -    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_18

 onmouseover="gutterOver(18)"

><td class="source">|| view   students    || x          || x             || x    || x       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_19

 onmouseover="gutterOver(19)"

><td class="source">|| manage classes     || x          || x             || -    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_20

 onmouseover="gutterOver(20)"

><td class="source">|| view   classes     || x          || x             || x    || x       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_21

 onmouseover="gutterOver(21)"

><td class="source">|| manage courses     || x          || x             || -    || x       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_22

 onmouseover="gutterOver(22)"

><td class="source">|| view   courses     || x          || x             || -    || x       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_23

 onmouseover="gutterOver(23)"

><td class="source">|| manage absences    || x          || x             || -    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_24

 onmouseover="gutterOver(24)"

><td class="source">|| view   absences    || x          || x             || x    || x       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_25

 onmouseover="gutterOver(25)"

><td class="source">|| manage testresults || x          || x             || -    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_26

 onmouseover="gutterOver(26)"

><td class="source">|| view   testresults || x          || x             || x    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_27

 onmouseover="gutterOver(27)"

><td class="source">|| manage reports     || x          || x             || -    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_28

 onmouseover="gutterOver(28)"

><td class="source">|| view   reports     || x          || x             || x    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_29

 onmouseover="gutterOver(29)"

><td class="source">|| manage accounts    || x          || x             || -    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_30

 onmouseover="gutterOver(30)"

><td class="source">|| view   accounts    || x          || x             || -    || -       ||<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_31

 onmouseover="gutterOver(31)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_32

 onmouseover="gutterOver(32)"

><td class="source">- manage = create,view,update,delete<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_33

 onmouseover="gutterOver(33)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_34

 onmouseover="gutterOver(34)"

><td class="source">=== Setup Authorizer ===<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_35

 onmouseover="gutterOver(35)"

><td class="source">{{{<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_36

 onmouseover="gutterOver(36)"

><td class="source">var authorizer:Authorizer = new Authorizer()<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_37

 onmouseover="gutterOver(37)"

><td class="source">authorizer.matrix.allowAll(&#39;supervisor&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_38

 onmouseover="gutterOver(38)"

><td class="source">authorizer.matrix.allowAll(&#39;administrator&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_39

 onmouseover="gutterOver(39)"

><td class="source">authorizer.matrix.authorizeRolesToActions(<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_40

 onmouseover="gutterOver(40)"

><td class="source">	true,<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_41

 onmouseover="gutterOver(41)"

><td class="source">	[&#39;dean&#39;,&#39;planner&#39;],<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_42

 onmouseover="gutterOver(42)"

><td class="source">	[&#39;view-students&#39;,&#39;view-classes&#39;,&#39;view-absences&#39;])<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_43

 onmouseover="gutterOver(43)"

><td class="source">authorizer.matrix.authorize(true,&#39;dean&#39;,&#39;view-testresults&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_44

 onmouseover="gutterOver(44)"

><td class="source">authorizer.matrix.authorize(true,&#39;dean&#39;,&#39;view-reports&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_45

 onmouseover="gutterOver(45)"

><td class="source">authorizer.matrix.authorize(true,&#39;planner&#39;,&#39;view-courses&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_46

 onmouseover="gutterOver(46)"

><td class="source">authorizer.matrix.authorize(true,&#39;planner&#39;,&#39;manage-courses&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_47

 onmouseover="gutterOver(47)"

><td class="source">authorizer.matrix.authorize(true,&#39;planner&#39;,&#39;manage-subjects&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_48

 onmouseover="gutterOver(48)"

><td class="source">}}}<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_49

 onmouseover="gutterOver(49)"

><td class="source">=== Use the Authorizer to control enablement of UI components ===<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_50

 onmouseover="gutterOver(50)"

><td class="source">In the code below, *studentTasks* is the name of an UIComponent that contains buttons to invoke actions on a Student object.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_51

 onmouseover="gutterOver(51)"

><td class="source">{{{<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_52

 onmouseover="gutterOver(52)"

><td class="source">studentTasks.enabled = authorizer.isAllowedTo(&#39;view-students&#39;)				<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_53

 onmouseover="gutterOver(53)"

><td class="source">studentClassTasks.enabled = authorizer.isAllowedTo(&#39;view-classes&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_54

 onmouseover="gutterOver(54)"

><td class="source">courseTasks.enabled = authorizer.isAllowedTo(&#39;view-courses&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_55

 onmouseover="gutterOver(55)"

><td class="source">absenceTasks.enabled = authorizer.isAllowedTo(&#39;view-absences&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_56

 onmouseover="gutterOver(56)"

><td class="source">testResultTasks.enabled = authorizer.isAllowedTo(&#39;view-testresults&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_57

 onmouseover="gutterOver(57)"

><td class="source">studentReportTasks.enabled = authorizer.isAllowedTo(&#39;view-reports&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_58

 onmouseover="gutterOver(58)"

><td class="source">subjectTasks.enabled = authorizer.isAllowedTo(&#39;view-subjects&#39;)				<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_59

 onmouseover="gutterOver(59)"

><td class="source">accountTasks.enabled = authorizer.isAllowedTo(&#39;view-accounts&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_60

 onmouseover="gutterOver(60)"

><td class="source">}}}<br></td></tr
></table></pre>

<script type="text/javascript">
 var lineNumUnderMouse = -1;
 
 function gutterOver(num) {
 gutterOut();
 var newTR = document.getElementById('gr_svn257_' + num);
 if (newTR) {
 newTR.className = 'undermouse';
 }
 lineNumUnderMouse = num;
 }
 function gutterOut() {
 if (lineNumUnderMouse != -1) {
 var oldTR = document.getElementById(
 'gr_svn257_' + lineNumUnderMouse);
 if (oldTR) {
 oldTR.className = '';
 }
 lineNumUnderMouse = -1;
 }
 }
 var numsGenState = {table_base_id: 'nums_table_'};
 var srcGenState = {table_base_id: 'src_table_'};
 var alignerRunning = false;
 var startOver = false;
 function setLineNumberHeights() {
 if (alignerRunning) {
 startOver = true;
 return;
 }
 numsGenState.chunk_id = 0;
 numsGenState.table = document.getElementById('nums_table_0');
 numsGenState.row_num = 0;
 if (!numsGenState.table) {
 return; // Silently exit if no file is present.
 }
 srcGenState.chunk_id = 0;
 srcGenState.table = document.getElementById('src_table_0');
 srcGenState.row_num = 0;
 alignerRunning = true;
 continueToSetLineNumberHeights();
 }
 function rowGenerator(genState) {
 if (genState.row_num < genState.table.rows.length) {
 var currentRow = genState.table.rows[genState.row_num];
 genState.row_num++;
 return currentRow;
 }
 var newTable = document.getElementById(
 genState.table_base_id + (genState.chunk_id + 1));
 if (newTable) {
 genState.chunk_id++;
 genState.row_num = 0;
 genState.table = newTable;
 return genState.table.rows[0];
 }
 return null;
 }
 var MAX_ROWS_PER_PASS = 1000;
 function continueToSetLineNumberHeights() {
 var rowsInThisPass = 0;
 var numRow = 1;
 var srcRow = 1;
 while (numRow && srcRow && rowsInThisPass < MAX_ROWS_PER_PASS) {
 numRow = rowGenerator(numsGenState);
 srcRow = rowGenerator(srcGenState);
 rowsInThisPass++;
 if (numRow && srcRow) {
 if (numRow.offsetHeight != srcRow.offsetHeight) {
 numRow.firstChild.style.height = srcRow.offsetHeight + 'px';
 }
 }
 }
 if (rowsInThisPass >= MAX_ROWS_PER_PASS) {
 setTimeout(continueToSetLineNumberHeights, 10);
 } else {
 alignerRunning = false;
 if (startOver) {
 startOver = false;
 setTimeout(setLineNumberHeights, 500);
 }
 }
 }
 function initLineNumberHeights() {
 // Do 2 complete passes, because there can be races
 // between this code and prettify.
 startOver = true;
 setTimeout(setLineNumberHeights, 250);
 window.onresize = setLineNumberHeights;
 }
 initLineNumberHeights();
</script>

 <script type="text/javascript" src="https://ssl.gstatic.com/codesite/ph/3197964839662303775/js/kibbles.js"></script>
 <script type="text/javascript">
 var lastStop = null;
 var initialized = false;
 
 function updateCursor(next, prev) {
 if (prev && prev.element) {
 prev.element.className = 'cursor_stop cursor_hidden';
 }
 if (next && next.element) {
 next.element.className = 'cursor_stop cursor';
 lastStop = next.index;
 }
 }
 
 function pubRevealed(data) {
 updateCursorForCell(data.cellId, 'cursor_stop cursor_hidden');
 if (initialized) {
 reloadCursors();
 }
 }
 
 function draftRevealed(data) {
 updateCursorForCell(data.cellId, 'cursor_stop cursor_hidden');
 if (initialized) {
 reloadCursors();
 }
 }
 
 function draftDestroyed(data) {
 updateCursorForCell(data.cellId, 'nocursor');
 if (initialized) {
 reloadCursors();
 }
 }
 function reloadCursors() {
 kibbles.skipper.reset();
 loadCursors();
 if (lastStop != null) {
 kibbles.skipper.setCurrentStop(lastStop);
 }
 }
 // possibly the simplest way to insert any newly added comments
 // is to update the class of the corresponding cursor row,
 // then refresh the entire list of rows.
 function updateCursorForCell(cellId, className) {
 var cell = document.getElementById(cellId);
 // we have to go two rows back to find the cursor location
 var row = getPreviousElement(cell.parentNode);
 row.className = className;
 }
 // returns the previous element, ignores text nodes.
 function getPreviousElement(e) {
 var element = e.previousSibling;
 if (element.nodeType == 3) {
 element = element.previousSibling;
 }
 if (element && element.tagName) {
 return element;
 }
 }
 function loadCursors() {
 // register our elements with skipper
 var elements = CR_getElements('*', 'cursor_stop');
 var len = elements.length;
 for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
 var element = elements[i]; 
 element.className = 'cursor_stop cursor_hidden';
 kibbles.skipper.append(element);
 }
 }
 function toggleComments() {
 CR_toggleCommentDisplay();
 reloadCursors();
 }
 function keysOnLoadHandler() {
 // setup skipper
 kibbles.skipper.addStopListener(
 kibbles.skipper.LISTENER_TYPE.PRE, updateCursor);
 // Set the 'offset' option to return the middle of the client area
 // an option can be a static value, or a callback
 kibbles.skipper.setOption('padding_top', 50);
 // Set the 'offset' option to return the middle of the client area
 // an option can be a static value, or a callback
 kibbles.skipper.setOption('padding_bottom', 100);
 // Register our keys
 kibbles.skipper.addFwdKey("n");
 kibbles.skipper.addRevKey("p");
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener(
 'u', function() { window.location = detail_url; });
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener(
 'r', function() { window.location = detail_url + '#publish'; });
 
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener('j', gotoNextPage);
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener('k', gotoPreviousPage);
 
 
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener('h', toggleComments);
 
 }
 </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
 function showPublishInstructions() {

 if (element) {
 element.className = 'opened';
